msquerybuilderbackend.business

Class ExpertQueryBusiness

  • java.lang.Object
    • msquerybuilderbackend.business.ExpertQueryBusiness

  • @Component
public class ExpertQueryBusiness
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for all activities with neo4j database regarding the entity ExpertQueryJsonObject in the application (ExpertQuery in the neo4j database)
    Author:
    drago

        public org.neo4j.ogm.model.Result executeExpertQuery(ExpertQueryJsonObject expertQuery)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        method which executes the querystring in the neo4j database of a given expertQuery(jsonobject)
        Parameters:
        expertQuery - is the object which contains the querystring and the parameter
        Returns:
        the result of the executed query from the neo4j database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a value and its given type of the expertQuery object do not match

      • createExpertQuery

        public java.lang.Long createExpertQuery(ExpertQueryJsonObject expertQueryJsonObject)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        method which checks the name of the given object if it already exists and returns 0L if true, otherwise it converts the given ExpertQueryJsonObject to an ExpertQuery object and creates it in the neo4j database as an ExpertQuery object
        Parameters:
        expertQueryJsonObject - is the expertQuery object to create
        Returns:
        the neo4j ID of the new expertQuery object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a value and its given type of the expertQuery object do not match

        queryId - is the ID of the object to delete; can be the neo4j ID or the unique name

        Parameters:

        the updated expertQuery object

        java.lang.Exception - if a value and its given type of the expertQuery object do not match

      • getExpertQuery

        public ExpertQueryJsonObject getExpertQuery(java.lang.String queryId)
        method which queries a certain ExpertQuery Object from the neo4j database and converts it to a ExpertQueryJsonObject for the frontend
        Parameters:
        queryId - is the ID of the object to find; can be the neo4j ID or the unique name
        Returns:
        the ExpertQueryJsonObject found as ExpertQuery object in the neo4j database

      • getExpertQueryBySearch

        public java.util.Set<ExpertQueryJsonObject> getExpertQueryBySearch(java.lang.String category,
                                                                   java.lang.String name,
                                                                   java.lang.String description)
        method which queries ExpertQuery objects in the neo4j database by given parameters and converts them to ExpertQueryJsonObject for the frontend
        Parameters:
        category - is the specific category in which the ExpertQuery objects have to be
        name - is the specific name or pattern which the ExpertQuery objects have to be named or contain in the name
        description - is a specific pattern which the ExpertQuery objects have to contain in the description
        Returns:
        a set of ExpertQueryJsonObjects which have been found with the given parameters
